title: Ticket #2307: TGZ archive of Dan Forrest's patches
description: An archive of Dan Forrest's patches from LMCG
remarks:
2011-Jul-14 15:47:41 by nwp: 
Nathan,

> I want to update condor on the LMCG pool; is there any traps that I
> need to watch out for or tweaks that you have put in that are
> essential to the labs operations?

Yes, there are lots of traps.  You do not want to update Condor...

If you do really want to, start here:

        /exports/condor/condor-7.1.1-linux-x86_64-rhel5/

And look at all of the .patch files.

If you have a source tree I can look at porting the patches and seeing
which still apply, but it is going to take some time.  It has always
been my intention to get these patches into the Condor development
tree, so this would be a good opportunity to get that going.

--
Dan

2011-Jul-14 16:05:45 by psilord:
Thank god, we finally got them in some form other than a stapled together and marked up hardcopy that was predictably and easily lost 5 minutes after we got it.
attachments:
• forrest-patches.tgz 271178 bytes added by nwp on 2011-Jul-14 20:34:53 UTC.
    The attachment contains the patches
creator: nwp
